title: 这游戏到底是吃显卡还是吃cpu还是吃内存？？
author: wangyuyaxin

replies.author: xianren66
replies.txt_content: 通吃，都说，有惩罚么？？嗯？

replies.author: hhehhehhe
replies.txt_content:
光影吃显卡啊
cpu还好，内存会占掉一些

replies.author: CM_沉默
replies.txt_content:
主要吃CPU
光影吃显卡

replies.author: 人称老秀
replies.txt_content: CPU是脑壳，显卡是要做的事情，你看哪个需不需要

replies.author: HuangYaoJun
replies.txt_content: 不是通吃嘛

replies.author: 其点
replies.txt_content: 必须是都吃啊

replies.author: yc1641096147
replies.txt_content: cpu吧 个人认为

replies.author: Lne
replies.txt_content:
通吃
不过吃cpu和内存更多一些（如果你的显卡过旧那你的体验也不会多好）

replies.author: FloatingBlocks
replies.txt_content: 原版吃U，而且只吃单核
cup和内存光影吃显卡

replies.author: 南镇
replies.txt_content: 原版都不吃！（确信）

replies.author: 石叶尾猫
replies.txt_content: 开光影之后 GTX1060 GPU吃到百分之百

replies.author: z327121579
replies.txt_content: 都吃，如果是光影的话比较吃显卡，计算吃cpu
不是通吃嘛

replies.author: 大猫猫咪
replies.txt_content: 都吃的，不过不开光影的话，更吃cpu一点。

replies.author: 织优
replies.txt_content: 主的话还是CPU   开了光影这种就是吃显卡了   我的笔记本风扇他不会骗我

replies.author: shiyuhui
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: a1059452331
replies.txt_content: MC游戏本身吃CPU，光影吃显卡

replies.author: efsg_
replies.txt_content: 我全都要.jpg

replies.author: NONGFUSPRLNGL
replies.txt_content: 吃CPU吧，光影吃显卡

replies.author: 飞翔~~
replies.txt_content: MOD多吃内存，光影吃显卡跟CPU

replies.author: Оil
replies.txt_content:
内存什么的还好，无脑分配给2G，肯定够用……= =^

具体说来倒是要看怎么玩的了。

开了光影+点燃一大堆的TNT，那肯定是三者都吃了……= =

replies.author: 重载
replies.txt_content: 是真的通吃嗷

replies.author: Sakura_六花
replies.txt_content: 个人认为是通吃

replies.author: Jannik
replies.txt_content: 开了光影加了模组的确是什么都吃

replies.author: xiaoxing_OVO
replies.txt_content: 我默默的说一句，通吃......会怎样？别打脸
